arts.ttl: Arne Slot taking Feyenoord lesson forward as Liverpool prepare to face Real Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid won last season's Champions League and will provide a big test for Liverpool manager Arne Slot as they travel to Anfield looking to revive their European campaign

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola explains cut nose and responds to Man City fan boos after Feyenoord draw
arts.sum: Guardiola had a cut on his nose and other red marks visible on his head during Tuesday night’s dramatic Champions League match

arts.ttl: Man City 3-3 Feyenoord: City and Guardiola set five unwanted records in late Champions League collapse at the Etihad
arts.sum: Manchester City and Pep Guardiola rack up five unwanted records from their shock 3-3 draw with Feyenoord in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: The stats that SHAME Manchester City - as three-goal collapse against Feyenoord sees Pep Guardiola's men set unwanted Champions League history
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola's side had seemed set to return to winning way after a five-games losing streak as they led Dutch side Feyenoord 3-0 at the Etihad with just 15 minutes remaining.

arts.ttl: Man City 3-3 Feyenoord: Haaland breaks Champions League goals record; edges closer to another
arts.sum: Erling Haaland becomes the fastest player to 50 goal involvements in Champions League history, doing so in just 44 appearances.

arts.ttl: Man City must 'show character' after Feyenoord collapse says Nathan Ake before Liverpool test
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola’s crisis-stricken side head to Anfield after five straight losses followed by throwing away a 3-0 lead late in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Feyenoord fans tease Manchester City supporters at the Etihad with Arne Slot chant
arts.sum: The traveling Feyenoord supporters made themselves heard in the Etihad Stadium on Tuesday night. It’s estimated that more than 3,000 fans made the trip from Rotterdam to the North of England…

arts.ttl: The Verdict | Are City now in crisis after Feyenoord collapse?
arts.sum: Ben Ransom is joined by Adam Bate to analyse Manchester City's collapse against Feyenoord in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola laments Man City's inability to win games as their winless run is extended to SIX matches after surrendering a three-goal lead in the last 15 minutes against Feyenoord
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL AT THE ETIHAD STADIUM: Pep Guardiola bemoaned his Manchester City side's inability to win games after they blew a 3-0 lead against Feyenoord.

arts.ttl: Feyenoord make Champions League history in thrilling 3-3 comeback against Manchester City
arts.sum: Feyenoord recorded a remarkable result in the Champions League on Tuesday night, coming from three goals down to draw 3-3 against Manchester City. The Rotterdam club sent City into further…
